name: @tpmjs/churn-risk-score
description: Scores customer churn risk based on usage, engagement, and support signals

tools.description: Scores customer churn risk based on usage, engagement, and support signals. Provides risk score (0-100) with detailed contributing factors and recommendations.

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: Customer data with activity metrics including usage, engagement, and support interactions

returns.description: Risk score with contributing factors, risk level, and retention recommendations

aiAgent.useCase: Use this tool to identify at-risk customers, prioritize retention efforts, and proactively reduce churn. Ideal for customer success teams and account managers.
aiAgent.limitations: Requires comprehensive customer data. Risk scoring is heuristic-based and should be combined with human judgment for critical decisions.
examples: Identify customers at high risk of churning
Monitor customer health scores over time
